content: snow cool about this pattern when my daughter saw this design she said that s so cool this pattern uses basic crochet stitches and would be suitable for a beginner that wants to stretch their skills a video is available for this pattern video crochet level advanced beginner materials needed yarn- worsted weight #4 about 75-100 yards notes red heart super saver pink and a bernat brand blue sorry label was lost were used for samples hook- size i or 5 5 mm is suggested you can bump up or down a size depending on yarn used notes a larger hook could be used for a larger headband headband does have some stretch to it yarn needle sonja m otto © 2024 abbreviations used in this pattern chain- chain cont- continue double_crochet- double_crochet esc- extended single_crochet repeat- repeat single_crochet- single_crochet skip- skip slip_stitch- slip_stitch st- stitch space- space yo- yarn over snow cool page 1 of 3 directions notes pattern is made in row and then stitched to form a circle chain 16 special stitches esc extended single_crochet - insert hook in next stitch yo and pull up a loop chain 1 yo pull through remaining 2 loops one esc made here is a video for extra help esc row 1 right side working in back bump of chain esc in 2nd chain from hook cont to esc across 15 esc row 2 chain 1 turn esc in first st esc across 15 esc row 3 chain 1 turn esc in first st esc in next st chain 15 skip 5 st esc in next st skip 5 st chain 15 esc in last 2 st 5 esc and 2 chain 15 loops row 4 chain 1 turn single_crochet in first 2 st double_crochet in next 5 st skipped stitches from previous row single_crochet in next st double_crochet in next 5 st single_crochet in last 2 st 5 single_crochet and 10 double_crochet / note when working this row make sure your chain 15 loops are pushed away from you all even row are the wrong side you want the chain 15 loops to be on your right side of your work row 5-10 repeat row 3 and 4 row 11 chain 1 turn esc in first st esc in next 3 st *take the bottom chain 15 loop and tuck it under the other loops grab loop with your hook and esc in the next st you are stitching around the chain 15 loop and in the next st see photo * esc in next 5 st repeat from * once esc in last 4 st -15 esc row 12 chain 1 turn esc across -15 esc row 13-18 repeat row 11 and 12 row 19-48 repeat row 3-18 snow cool page 2 of 3 finishing fold ear warmer in half with right sides touching fold each end see photo tuck in ends so that you have 4 layers see bottom photo chain 1 slip_stitch across all 4 layers cut
